title: Definitions
description: Common definitions used in schema files.

noDataValue.title: No Data Value
noDataValue.description: A `noData` value represents missing data — also known as a sentinel value — wherever it appears. For `SCALAR` attributes this is a number. For `VECN` attributes this is an array of `N` numbers. For `MATN` attributes this is `N` arrays of `N` numbers.
